title: SAMSUNG GALAXY S24 ULTRA 5G 6.8", 200+50+10+12/12MP, 12/256GB, 5000MAH TITANIUM GRAY

features.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 5x3.2 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.3 GHz Cortex-A520)
features.Primary Camera 1: 200 MP, f/1.7, 24mm (wide), 1/1.3", 0.6µm, multi-directional PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
features.Primary Telephoto Camera: 50 MP, (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 5x optical zoom
features.Primary Telephoto Camera 2: 10 MP, f/2.4, 70mm (telephoto), 1/3.52", 1.12µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
features.Primary Ultrawide Camera: 12 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120° (ultrawide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, Super Steady video
